line.text: Devouring Time blunt thou the lion paws
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: And make the earth devour her own sweet brood
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Pluck the keen teeth from the fierce tiger jaws
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: And burn the long-lived phoenix in her blood
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Make glad and sorry seasons as thou fleet
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: And do whateer thou wilt swift-footed Time
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: To the wide world and all her fading sweets
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: But I forbid thee one most heinous crime
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: O carve not with thy hours my love fair brow
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Nor draw no lines there with thine antique pen
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Him in thy course untainted do allow
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: For beauty pattern to succeeding men
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Yet do thy worst old Time despite thy wrong
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: My love shall in my verse ever live young
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*
